scene_target: Artie survives his first combat encounter through a massive, glitchy critical hit.
goal: Demonstrate the 'Crit or Quit' build in action, highlighting the absurdity of 100% crit rate paired with zero accuracy.
conflict: Artie's complete lack of combat experience versus a hostile tutorial enemy while at 1 HP.
constraints: depict exactly five consecutive misses due to poor form
depict one massive overkill crit on the sixth attempt
the crit must vaporize the slime and a nearby environmental object (tree)
Artie must reach Level 2 by the end of the scene
end_condition: The slime is deleted from existence, Artie levels up, and the immediate area is a smoking crater.

set.reason: Level up and title progress after first combat victory via overkill crit.

persona_updates: Artie is now aware that his 'Crit or Quit' build has the potential to cause massive environmental damage.
Artie feels a mix of terror and empowerment after his first successful (if glitchy) combat encounter.

global_continuity_system_updates.reason: Massive overkill crit caused localized data truncation and environmental vaporization.

inventory_alignment_updates.reason: Normalization of inventory after first combat encounter.

chapter_so_far_add: Artie survived his first combat encounter in the Slime Fields through a reality-warping critical hit.
Artie reached Level 2, confirming the viability (and danger) of his glitchy build.
key_events: Artie missed five consecutive attacks against a Level 1 Slime due to poor form.
Artie triggered a massive overkill critical hit on his sixth attempt with a pathetic shove.
The critical hit vaporized a Lesser Green Slime and disintegrated a nearby environmental oak tree.
Artie leveled up to Level 2 and received a system warning about environmental damage.
Artie made progress toward the 'One-Hit Wonder' title (1/10).
last_scene: Artie faced a Lesser Green Slime in the Slime Fields, missing five consecutive attacks due to poor form and panic.
On his sixth attempt, a pathetic shove triggered a 'Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit' that vaporized the slime and a nearby tree.
Artie reached Level 2 and received a system warning about environmental destruction.
